about_the_game:
Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story. Experience gorgeous levels full of obstacles, enemies & breathtaking music.

Key Features

  • For fans of dynamic story driven exploration games like Sable & Journey
  • A personal, intimate story written by a solo developer
  • An adventure of mystery, secrets and ancient wonders

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Video Card (Intel HD Graphics Not Supported)

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
